attributes.title: Badge Metric Field
attributes.readMe:
A pill-shaped badge for displaying key metrics and statistics with optional icon.

**Features:**
- Pill-shaped design with rounded edges
- Icon support for visual context
- Custom label text
- Decimal precision control (default: 2 decimals)
- Configurable range (default: 0-1000)

**Display Style:**
- Compact pill badge (atom view): Icon + value
- Larger badge (embedded view): Icon + value + label
- Background: Muted gray
- Border: Subtle outline

**Use Cases:**
- KPIs and dashboard metrics ("42 Users")
- Statistics display ("3.5k Views")
- Performance indicators
- Quick data summaries
